warscrolls.name: Abraxia, Spear of the Everchosen
warscrolls.fluff: Once a whelp in the Varanspire’s fighting pits, Abraxia has risen to command the Swords of Chaos – the infamous First Circle of the Varanguard. She is a warrior of matchless willpower, convinced that there is no challenge she cannot best through bloody-minded grit. To Abraxia, Chaos represents a state of perpetual testing rather than being embodied in four insane gods. Such an anti-deific attitude pleases Archaon, who offers Abraxia that rarest of boons – a measure of his trust. In her conquest of the Sigmarite city of the Phoenicium, Abraxia consumed the sacred fire at the bastion’s heart. Cinder now flickers when she speaks, while in her eyes rages a tortured and captive flame.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Monster, Ward (5+), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Warriors of Chaos

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of the Thanatorg’s Claws and Fangs is 4.

abilities.name: Roar of Domination
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.lore: The Thanatorg is quick to put potential usurpers of Abraxia’s power in their place.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy HERO in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, subtract 1 from the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Blood of Molten Varanite
abilities.lore: Any who wound the Thanatorg risk being splashed by its highly mutative blood.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice each time a damage point inflicted by a combat attack is allocated to this unit. On a 4+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the FIGHT ability has been resolved.

abilities.name: Warlord of the First Circle
abilities.lore: Abraxia commands the Swords of Chaos with relentless brutality.
abilities.effect: If a friendly Varanguard unit uses the ‘Relentless Killers’ ability while it is wholly within 12" of this unit, that unit does not have STRIKE-LAST as a result of that ability.

abilities.name: Gorbolga the Accurs'd
abilities.lore: A ‘gift’ from the Everchosen, Gorbolga is a varanite spear that carries a potent mutative curse – but should its wielder’s will slip, they too will learn of its hunger…
abilities.effect:
If this unit is in combat, roll a dice and apply the corresponding effect:

1 - Uncontrollable Power:
Allocate 1 damage point to this unit.

2 - The Spear Slumbers:
No effect.

3-5 - White-hot Varanite:
Add 1 to the Damage characteristic of this unit’s Gorbolga for the rest of the turn.

6 - Rampant Mutation:
The effect of ‘White-hot Varanite’ applies and this unit’s Gorbolga has Crit (Mortal) for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Archaon, the Everchosen
warscrolls.fluff: Archaon is the Everchosen, champion of the Ruinous Powers, anointed in the blood of butchered empires. Many worship him as a demigod of Chaos, the primordial ruin of the false god Sigmar. It is true that the Everchosen despises the God-King – but he reserves similar loathings for the Brothers in Darkness, and indeed all deities. Were Archaon’s ultimate goals to be realised, it would be his banners alone rising over the charred corpse of the realms.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Warmaster, Unique, Hero, Monster, Wizard (2), Fly, Ward (5+), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Daemon, Warriors of Chaos

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of Dorghar’s Claws and Tails is 4.

abilities.name: The Slayer of Kings
abilities.lore: This ancient daemonblade thirsts for the souls of champions and warlords.
abilities.effect: Each time this unit uses a FIGHT ability, if the unmodified wound roll for 2 or more attacks made with The Slayer of Kings that target the same HERO is 6, that HERO is automatically destroyed.

abilities.name: Three-headed Titan
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.lore: The greater daemons consumed by Dorghar imbue the Everchosen’s steed with unlimited power.
abilities.effect:
Pick 1 of the following effects:

Filth-spewer: Pick an enemy unit within 6" of this unit and roll a number of dice equal to the number of models in that unit, to a maximum of 7. For each 3+, inflict 1 mortal damage on that unit.

Skull-gorger: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit and roll a dice. If the roll exceeds that unit’s Health characteristic, 1 model in that unit is slain and you can Heal (X) this unit, where X is that unit’s Health characteristic.

Spell-eater: Pick a MANIFESTATION within 12" of this unit and roll a dice. On a 2+, it is banished and removed from play. In addition, inflict D3 mortal damage on the unit that summoned it.

abilities.name: The Eye of Sheerian
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Hero Phase
abilities.lore: Torn from the corpse of a mighty dragon, this artefact grants Archaon visions of future events.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. This roll replaces the priority roll of the next battle round. On a 1-3, your opponent must take the first turn of that battle round. On a 4-6, you must take the first turn of that battle round. This ability cannot be used if there is an enemy Archaon on the battlefield.

warscrolls.name: Be'lakor, the Dark Master
warscrolls.fluff: Once, Be’lakor – first of the Daemon Princes – stood paramount before the Ruinous Powers. How he fell from these heights is not known; likely his ambitions played a part, for Be’lakor craves godhood. His punishment was to crown each Everchosen but be denied the mantle himself. Yet Be’lakor is a creature of matchless cunning; even as he raged at his predicament, nursing hatred for the ‘False King’ Archaon, he schemed to reclaim his place at the forefront of the hordes of Chaos.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Warmaster, Unique, Hero, Monster, Wizard (2), Fly, Ward (6+), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Daemon

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Blade of Shadows is 6.

abilities.name: Enfeeble Foe
abilities.lore: With a series of hissed incantations, Be’lakor instils visions of loss and despair in the minds of his enemies to drain them of their fighting spirit.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect:
Until the start of your next turn:

• Subtract 1 from hit rolls from the target’s combat attacks.
• The target’s combat attacks cannot score critical hits (treat them as regular hits instead).

abilities.name: Shadow Form
abilities.lore: Be’lakor can shift his physical form to be as insubstantial as the mists of Ulgu – and just as hard to land a telling blow upon.
abilities.effect: Ignore modifiers to save rolls for this unit (positive and negative).

abilities.name: Deadly Trap
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Enemy Combat Phase
abilities.lore: The Dark Master delights in lethal reversals of expectation and fate.
abilities.declare: Pick this unit and up to 2 friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS units within this unit’s combat range to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each target. On a 4+, that target has STRIKE-FIRST for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: The Dark Master
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Enemy Hero Phase
abilities.lore: Many puppets dance on Be’lakor’s infernal strings. Few realise as much until their fate is sealed.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Until the start of your next turn, each time the target is picked to use an ability, roll a dice as a reaction. On a 3+, that ability has no effect.

warscrolls.name: Centaurion Marshal
warscrolls.fluff: The Centaurion Marshals are creatures of terrifying stature that serve as focal points for the First Prince’s legions, commanding warriors sworn to them with cunning and tactical guile before charging headlong into the fray, where they wreak havoc upon the enemy.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Cavalry, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness

abilities.name: Marshal of the Legions
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for this unit
abilities.lore: Not only formidable combatants, Centaurion Marshals lead the forces of the First Prince into battle with an iron fist.
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly non-HERO DAEMON or Chaos Legionnaires unit that has not used a FIGHT ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a FIGHT ability immediately after the FIGHT ability used by this unit has been resolved. If it is picked to do so, add 1 to hit rolls for the target’s attacks for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Chaos Chariot
warscrolls.fluff: The chariots of Chaos are implements of crushing death that leave a wake of corpses. Forged from black iron, they are capable of attaining remarkable speed in spite of their bulk, converting gathered momentum into deadly force as they hurtle into the enemy ranks. It is considered a great honour to make war from a chariot, for these constructs are as pulpits from which the murderous will of the Dark Gods can be enacted.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: War Machine, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Warriors of Chaos

abilities.name: Swift Death
abilities.lore: Chaos Chariots are at their most deadly on the charge, where their considerable bulk and bladed wheels can cause untold devastation.
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

warscrolls.name: Chaos Chosen
warscrolls.fluff: Devotees of Chaos who garner many dark rewards may rise to the ranks of the Chosen. Armed with wicked soul-cleaving weapons, these champions fight at the forefront of the Chaotic hordes, inspiring their brethren through acts of brutal violence.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/5), Standard Bearer (1/5), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Warriors of Chaos

abilities.name: Heralds of Ruination
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
abilities.lore: Paragons of the Dark Gods, Chaos Chosen cut a swathe through the enemy lines, leaving nothing but blood and ruin in their wake.
abilities.effect: This unit can use 2 FIGHT abilities this phase. After the first is used, however, this unit has STRIKE-LAST for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Chaos Furies
warscrolls.fluff: Furies are spiteful daemonic imps that throng those lands under the sway of Chaos. Though individually weak, when they swarm they can prove surprisingly deadly, waiting until the foe’s back is turned before launching vicious hit-and-run attacks.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Fly, Ward (6+), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Daemon

abilities.name: Sneaky Little Devils
abilities.lore: Chaos Furies are spiteful creatures that utterly loathe the idea of engaging in a fair fight, much preferring – where possible – to stab distracted enemies in the back.
abilities.effect: If this unit is in combat, roll a dice. On a 3+, this unit can immediately use the ‘Retreat’ ability as if it were your movement phase without any mortal damage being inflicted on it.

warscrolls.name: Chaos Knights
warscrolls.fluff: The coming of the Chaos Knights heralds a crushing defeat for their adversaries. These dreaded champions charge fearlessly into the deadliest of battles, striking down foes all around them with sundering blows from their ensorcelled weapons.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Champion, Musician (1/5), Standard Bearer (1/5), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Warriors of Chaos

abilities.name: Impaling Charge
abilities.lore: A charging Chaos Knight is capable of spitting several enemies at once with the point of their ensorcelled polearm.
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this turn, for the rest of the turn, add 1 to the Rend characteristic of its Cursed Lances.

warscrolls.name: Chaos Legionnaires
warscrolls.fluff: Sworn to Be’lakor, these warriors wage war on two different fronts. They openly march alongside the legions of Chaos, bringing ruin to the Mortal Realms, yet serve ulterior motives, seeking to undermine the Everchosen and secure the ascension of the First Prince in his stead.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion (1/8), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Undivided

abilities.name: Sow Confusion
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
abilities.lore: To the disciples of Be’lakor, subterfuge and lies are as keen as any blade.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit within 6" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 4+, the target cannot use commands for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Chaos Lord
warscrolls.fluff: Chaos Lords are dark champions who have walked the Path to Glory and are now only one step away from glory or damnation. They are the rulers of great warbands and hordes, and their followers will die before failing these fearsome warlords.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Warriors of Chaos

abilities.name: Glory In Battle
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for this unit
abilities.lore: Under the command of their warlord, the warriors sworn to them waste no time in slaying the enemy.
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly non-HERO WARRIORS OF CHAOS INFANTRY unit that has not used a FIGHT ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a FIGHT ability immediately after the FIGHT ability used by this unit has been resolved. If it is picked to do so, add 1 to wound rolls for the target’s attacks for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Chaos Lord on Daemonic Mount
warscrolls.fluff: Particularly favoured Chaos Lords may be granted a daemonic steed to bear them into battle. These champions become the rulers of feared cavalry warbands, driving their mounted brethren into battle with roared oaths to the Dark Gods.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Cavalry, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Warriors of Chaos

abilities.name: The Knights of Chaos
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for this unit
abilities.lore: At the head of a charge, this Chaos Lord leads their cavalry to crush any foe before them.
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly non-HERO WARRIORS OF CHAOS CAVALRY unit that has not used a FIGHT ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a FIGHT ability immediately after the FIGHT ability used by this unit has been resolved. If it is picked to do so, add 1 to wound rolls for the target’s attacks for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Chaos Lord on Karkadrak
warscrolls.fluff: Karkadraks are monstrous lizard-beasts clad in thick scales, whose destructive rampages are almost impossible to stop. Only the strongest Chaos Lords can dominate a Karkadrak, but those who succeed become truly deadly linebreakers.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Cavalry, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Warriors of Chaos

abilities.name: Drive The Legions Forward
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Any Charge Phase
abilities.lore: Mounted atop a mighty Karkadrak, the Chaos Lord signals the charge.
abilities.declare: Pick this unit and up to 2 friendly non-HERO non-CAVALRY WARRIORS OF CHAOS units wholly within 12" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Add 2 to charge rolls for the targets for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Brutish Rampage
abilities.lore: A charging Karkadrak is an almost unstoppable force, capable of smashing straight through even the most determined shieldwall.
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick up to 3 enemy units within 1" of it to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

warscrolls.name: Chaos Lord on Manticore
warscrolls.fluff: For those Chaos Lords who truly wish to display their dominance, only one form of mount will suffice: a Manticore, a terrible leonine beast from the wildest reaches of the realms. A Manticore is an apex predator of the battlefield, devoid of fear and filled with a berserk frenzy as it soars on great leathery wings. Only the most iron-willed of warlords can collar a Manticore’s bloodthirsty frenzy and compel the beast to serve their purpose. Those who do, however, gain a monstrous living weapon capable of shattering a battleline single-handedly.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Monster, Fly, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Warriors of Chaos

abilities.name: Iron-willed Overlord
abilities.lore: Manticores are berserk killers, and any Chaos Lord who rides one to battle displays such obvious dominance that none would dare deny their orders.
abilities.effect: Add 2 to the control scores of friendly WARRIORS OF CHAOS units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Apex Predator
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.lore: It is a point of pride to a Manticore rider that they and their steed are the apex predators of the battlefield. They seek out the strongest foes and do not rest until they have proven their supremacy with a vicious kill.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy MONSTER in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls for this unit’s combat attacks that target that MONSTER for the rest of the turn. This ability also affects Companion weapons.

warscrolls.name: Chaos Sorcerer Lord
warscrolls.fluff: The very air around a Sorcerer Lord is saturated with dark magic. With their command of daemonic powers and gift of foresight, these warlocks bolster the power of their allies while unleashing their own devastating spellcraft on the enemy.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Warriors of Chaos

abilities.name: Oracular Visions
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
abilities.lore: A sorcerer can temporarily bestow the gift of foresight upon their allies, helping them ward against enemy blows.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly WARRIORS OF CHAOS unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target and roll a dice.
abilities.effect: On a 3+, the target has WARD (5+) until the start of your next turn.

warscrolls.name: Chaos Sorcerer Lord on Manticore
warscrolls.fluff: Chaos Sorcerers wield the energies of magic unbound. Theirs are the old traditions of the soothsayer and the tribal shaman, empowered by eldritch gifts from their patron deities. The most aggressive Sorcerer Lords are not content to be whispering viziers to the champions of Chaos; they desire to command hordes, to see enemies terrified and broken before them. So do they seek out the winged alpha predators known as Manticores, arcanely forcing these beasts into service.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Monster, Wizard (1), Fly, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Warriors of Chaos

abilities.name: Oracular Visions
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
abilities.lore: A sorcerer can temporarily bestow the gift of foresight upon their allies, helping them ward against enemy blows.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly WARRIORS OF CHAOS unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target and roll a dice.
abilities.effect: On a 3+, the target has WARD (5+) until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Venomous Tail Strike
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.lore: The barbed tail of a Manticore secretes a paralysing toxin that can stun an enemy long enough for the Manticore to tear into them with impunity.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy MONSTER in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target has STRIKE-LAST for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Chaos Spawn
warscrolls.fluff: Those who receive too many gifts from the gods may degenerate into a hideous Chaos Spawn. Lumpen and misformed, these creatures lurch from their lairs when death is on the wind, slaughtering all before them with flailing tentacles and crooked claws.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Beast, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness

abilities.name: Beast
abilities.effect: This unit has a maximum control score of 1.

abilities.name: Drawn to Power
abilities.lore: Even cursed with their hideous and twisted form, Chaos Spawn still covet the boons of the Dark Gods and are drawn to those most favoured by their patron.
abilities.effect: While this unit is wholly within 12" of a friendly Daemon Prince, you can re-roll the random characteristic rolls for this unit’s Move and Attacks characteristics.

warscrolls.name: Chaos Warriors
warscrolls.fluff: Clad in hellforged iron and swollen with dark blessings, Chaos Warriors are the bane of civilisation. Entire legions of these armoured killers march into battle in search of divine favour, each warrior the equal of several lesser mortals.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/10), Standard Bearer (1/10), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Warriors of Chaos

abilities.name: Bringers of Desolation
abilities.lore: Chaos Warriors fight with relentless ferocity in those places consecrated to the Dark Gods.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s Rune-etched Weapons while it is contesting an objective you control.

warscrolls.name: Chaos Warshrine
warscrolls.fluff: Though the Ruinous Powers are worshipped at countless warped temples and unholy sites, it is only in battle that they may truly be honoured. The most devout champions of Chaos seek to combine both these forms of worship, crafting bladed shrines that are carried into battle by swollen and lumbering mutants. These Warshrines are utterly suffused with fell powers. Their altars are slick with the blood of the sacrificed slain, and the great icon that crowns them pulses with the energies of the Dark Gods.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Priest (1), War Machine, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Warriors of Chaos

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Flailing Fists is 4.

abilities.name: Protection of the Dark Gods
abilities.lore: Worshippers of the Ruinous Powers gather around these shrines in the hope of receiving divine protection.
abilities.effect: Friendly WARRIORS OF CHAOS units have WARD (6+) while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Favour of Chaos
abilities.lore: The Shrinemaster invokes the Dark Pantheon to bless nearby followers with their favour.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target. Then, make a chanting roll of D6.
abilities.effect:
Apply 1 of the following effects to the target for the rest of the turn:

• Undivided: When the target uses the ‘Rally’ command, you can make 3 additional rally rolls of D6.
• Khorne: Add 1 to hit rolls for the target’s attacks.
• Tzeentch: The target has WARD (5+).
• Nurgle: Add 1 to wound rolls for the target’s attacks.
• Slaanesh: Add 1 to the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for the target, to a maximum of 3.

If the chanting roll was 8+, you can pick up to 2 eligible units to be the targets instead of 1.

warscrolls.name: Corvus Cabal
warscrolls.fluff: Agile and avaricious, the murder-cultists of the Corvus Cabal descend on their prey from above. Always hunting for worthy trinkets to offer the Great Gatherer, chaotic patron of cut-throats and thieves, the Cabal strike without warning or mercy.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion (1/9), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Undivided

abilities.name: Strike From The Shadows
abilities.lore: From an unseen quarter, these agile warriors race forward to cut down the enemy.
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it is lurking in the shadows.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units. Then, add 1 to charge rolls for this unit for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Shadow-lurkers
abilities.lore: The Corvus Cabal favour stalking their prey and striking from unexpected angles.
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it has not been deployed.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit in reserve lurking in the shadows. It has now been deployed.

warscrolls.name: Cypher Lords
warscrolls.fluff: The Cypher Lords seek not only to defeat their foes, but to drive them to insanity, for they believe madness is the purest form of Chaos. In battle, the alchemical bombs and illusory tactics of these Hyshian cultists render them almost impossible to pin down.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion (1/8), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Undivided

abilities.name: Shattered Gloom Globes
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Hero Phase
abilities.lore: Thrallmasters carry globes that release dense clouds of shimmersmoke when shattered, choking the foe and masking the Cypher Lords’ advance.
abilities.effect: This unit cannot be targeted by shooting attacks for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Acrobatic Leaps
abilities.lore: In a dizzying display of agility, the Cypher Lords somersault towards the foe before cutting them to ribbons with their exotic blades.
abilities.effect: This unit has STRIKE-FIRST if it charged in the same turn.

warscrolls.name: Daemon Prince
warscrolls.fluff: Daemon Princes are those champions who, through determination and countless atrocities, have surpassed the heights of the Path to Glory. Only the most vanishingly rare souls can hold the gods’ attention long enough to achieve this apotheosis, joining the infernal ranks of daemonkind as an embodiment of Chaos itself. The earth rebels at their presence, for they are things that should not exist. Palls of shadow surround a Daemon Prince as the land cracks and vomits torrents of hellflame. With talon and cursed blade, the Daemon Prince brings ruin to the realms, assured that there are none who might challenge them.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Ward (6+), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Daemon

abilities.name: Airborne Horror
abilities.lore: Carried aloft by ragged leathery wings, this favoured champion of the Chaos Gods will bring ruin wherever they descend.
abilities.effect: If this unit has Wings, it has a Move characteristic of 10" and has FLY.

abilities.name: The Mounted Skulls of the Fallen
abilities.lore: Some Daemon Princes revel in glory with each worthy foe slain by their hands.
abilities.effect: If this unit has a Trophy Rack, its Hellforged Weapons also have Anti‑HERO (+1 Rend).

abilities.name: Immortal Champion
abilities.lore: Those favoured enough to ascend to daemonhood are among the most deadly servants of the Ruinous Powers.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 4+, this unit has STRIKE-FIRST for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Darkfire Daemonrift
warscrolls.fluff: Darkfire Daemonrifts are eldritch portals torn ajar by fell incantations. Once the veil has been sundered, raw magic seeping from the Realm of Chaos forms an opening for the horrors beyond to vent their spite, widened and empowered by spellcraft that draws upon the essence of Chaos.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Manifestation, Endless Spell, Fly, Ward (6+), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness

abilities.name: Fuelled By Sorcery
abilities.lore: A Darkfire Daemonrift absorbs magical power, widening and expelling ever more gouts of ruinous sorcery as it hungrily devours arcane energies.
abilities.effect:
Each time a spell is successfully cast by a unit within 12" of this MANIFESTATION, give this MANIFESTATION 1 ruinous energy point, to a maximum of 6.

Each time this MANIFESTATION uses a SHOOT ability, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of its Darkfire Torrent for each ruinous energy point it has.

If this MANIFESTATION is removed from play, all of its ruinous energy points are lost.

warscrolls.name: Darkoath Chieftain
warscrolls.fluff: Darkoath Chieftains lead their barbarian tribes to war with the fury and conviction of the truly devoted. These masterful warriors are always seeking greater challenges, and their skill at arms is spoken of in awe by their followers.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Darkoath

abilities.name: Oath of Murder
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, End of Any Turn
abilities.lore: Darkoath Chieftains offer up the souls of enemy lords and champions in exchange for divine power.
abilities.effect: If this unit destroyed an enemy HERO or MONSTER this turn, this unit has STRIKE-FIRST for the rest of the battle.

abilities.name: Tribal Warleader
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for this unit
abilities.lore: With strength and fierce purpose, the rulers of the Darkoath tribes lead those sworn to their banners into the fray to fulfil their oaths.
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly non-HERO DARKOATH INFANTRY unit that has not used a FIGHT ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a FIGHT ability immediately after the FIGHT ability used by this unit has been resolved. If it is picked to do so, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Darkoath Chieftain on Warsteed
warscrolls.fluff: Only the mightiest and most ruthless Darkoath warriors may rise to command their tribe in battle. Their killing prowess honed by years of strife and slaughter, they lead their people to victory after bloody victory, claiming heads with every swing of their cursed weapons.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Cavalry, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Darkoath

abilities.name: Cavalry Warleader
abilities.lore: The Darkoath Chieftain leads the cavalry swiftly into the enemy ranks.
abilities.effect: You can re-roll charge rolls for friendly DARKOATH CAVALRY units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Oath of Murder
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, End of Any Turn
abilities.lore: Darkoath Chieftains offer up the souls of enemy lords and champions in exchange for divine power.
abilities.effect: If this unit destroyed an enemy HERO or MONSTER this turn, this unit has STRIKE-FIRST for the rest of the battle.

warscrolls.name: Darkoath Fellriders
warscrolls.fluff: The Darkoath prize speed and agility above all in their light cavalry. Fellriders are mounted daredevils, outflanking their foes on lightning-swift and aggressive mounts, riddling their ranks with volleys of javelins before charging in to deal the killing blow.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Champion, Musician (1/5), Standard Bearer (1/5), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Darkoath

abilities.name: Swift Attackers
abilities.lore: As they close in on the enemy at frightening speed, these skilled horsemen are nigh impossible to hit with missile fire.
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for shooting attacks that target this unit.

abilities.name: Oath of the Raider
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Charge Phase
abilities.lore: Before battle, Fellriders swear oaths to harry the enemy without mercy, showing no mercy to those stragglers who fall beneath their axes.
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this phase and is only in combat with 1 enemy unit, and that enemy unit is only in combat with this unit, add 1 to the Rend characteristic of this unit’s weapons for the rest of the battle.

warscrolls.name: Darkoath Marauders
warscrolls.fluff: Each and every Darkoath warrior is trained in the way of the axe and the sword from the youngest age. Having sworn bloody oaths to their patron gods, they seek to fulfil them by any means necessary, their bodies flushed with power by every pledge completed.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/10), Standard Bearer (1/10), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Darkoath

abilities.name: Oath of the Marauder
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Charge Phase
abilities.lore: These bloodthirsty tribal warriors loudly declare vows of violence and slaughter as they race after their foes.
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this phase and the unmodified charge roll was 8+, add 1 to the Rend characteristic of this unit’s weapons for the rest of the battle.

abilities.name: Glorious Death
abilities.lore: Ever keen to earn the favour of their tribe, when the eyes of the fiercest fighters are upon them, these warriors will not go down without a fight.
abilities.effect: While this unit is wholly within 12" of any friendly DARKOATH HEROES, each time a model in this unit is slain by a combat attack and that model was in combat with the attacking unit, roll a dice. On a 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the FIGHT ability has been resolved.

warscrolls.name: Darkoath Savagers
warscrolls.fluff: Screaming blood-curdling vows to the Ruinous Powers, the Darkoath Savagers make brutal war across the length and breadth of the Mortal Realms. To these barbarous marauders, each new dawn is an opportunity to win the favour of the gods.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion (1/10), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Darkoath

abilities.name: Oath of Conquest
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Hero Phase
abilities.lore: Heeding their Godspeaker’s proclamations, these warriors seek to earn glory by driving back the enemy.
abilities.effect: If this unit is contesting an objective you control that is wholly within enemy territory, this unit has WARD (5+) for the rest of the battle.

warscrolls.name: Darkoath Warqueen
warscrolls.fluff: A Darkoath Warqueen has proven herself the rightful ruler of her barbarian tribesfolk time and again. She has sworn dread pacts to bring carnage to the Mortal Realms, and all who stand in her way must face both her wrath and that of her devoted warriors.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Ward (5+), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Darkoath

abilities.name: Ruin-blessed Conqueror
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
abilities.lore: A Warqueen heeds the whispers of the gods, ravaging lands in their name and drawing their gaze onto her warrior hordes.
abilities.declare: Pick an objective that this unit is contesting.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, for the rest of the turn, other friendly DARKOATH units have WARD (5+) while they are contesting that objective.

abilities.name: Oath of Supremacy
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Charge Phase
abilities.lore: By the will of the gods, this warrior leads her barbarous horde into the lands of the enemy, allowing none to oppose them.
abilities.effect: If this unit is wholly within enemy territory and charged this phase, for the rest of the battle, add 1 to hit rolls for combat attacks made by friendly DARKOATH units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

warscrolls.name: Darkoath Wilderfiend
warscrolls.fluff: Wilderfiends are both guardians and persecutors of the Darkoath tribes. Once mortal heroes themselves, they have been warped and twisted into hunched abominations that crave flesh and wield powers of primal sorcery to annihilate their prey.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Beast, Ward (5+), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Darkoath

abilities.name: Beast
abilities.effect: This unit has a maximum control score of 1.

abilities.name: Feed on Flesh
abilities.lore: Having been appeased with sacrificial blood, this creature may bestow dark blessings upon its kin.
abilities.effect: Each time a model (friendly or enemy) is slain within 12" of this unit, give this unit a sacrifice point, to a maximum of 6. If there are more than 1 friendly Darkoath Wilderfiend units within 12" of the slain model, only 1 of them can be given a sacrifice point for that slain model.

abilities.name: Primal Sorcery
abilities.lore: Though bestial, Darkoath Wilderfiends possess innate powers of sorcery.
abilities.effect:
Pick 1 of the following effects:

Mind Shroud: Pick an enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target and roll a number of dice equal to the number of sacrifice points this unit has. If any of the rolls are a 5+, the target cannot use commands for the rest of the turn.

Warping Balefire: Pick an enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target and roll a number of dice equal to the number of sacrifice points this unit has. For each 3+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

Dark Might: Heal (X) this unit, where X is the number of sacrifice points this unit has.

After applying the effect you picked, reset this unit’s sacrifice points to 0.

warscrolls.name: Eightfold Doom-Sigil
warscrolls.fluff: Eightfold Doom-Sigils are icons of Chaos in all its glory, blazing symbols of pure ruin. To fall in the presence of such a sorcerous construct is to be damned, for these lingering spells hungrily suck souls into the Realm of Chaos for the gods to feast upon.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Manifestation, Endless Spell, Ward (6+), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness

abilities.name: Empowered By Atrocity
abilities.lore: The souls of those slain in the presence of an Eightfold Doom-Sigil are absorbed by the magical manifestation, feeding the Dark Gods’ eternal hunger and inspiring their servants to battle all the harder, even as their own lives are offered in tribute.
abilities.effect: If 2 or more units (friendly or enemy) were destroyed this turn, for the rest of the turn, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS units while they are wholly within 12" of this MANIFESTATION.

warscrolls.name: Eternus, Blade of the First Prince
warscrolls.fluff: Sworn to Be’lakor and granted immortality, Eternus rides at the head of First Prince’s legions, crushing those who oppose his ascension. His mighty weapons are not his only means of waging war, for Eternus commands a vast network of spies and warriors loyal to the Dark Master.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Cavalry, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness

abilities.name: Veins of Black Lightning
abilities.lore: Reborn in the Cursed Skies above the realms, Eternus’s soul is tethered to the Mortal Realms through the dark magics of his master; whenever he is struck down, a flash of black lightning sees him stand defiant once more.
abilities.declare: This unit can use this ability if it has been destroyed.
abilities.effect: Roll 2D6. Add 1 to the roll if a friendly Be’lakor is on the battlefield. On an 8+, set up a replacement unit on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Network of Spies
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: Opponent declared a command for a unit within 12" of this unit
abilities.lore: Eternus commands a legion of agents and operatives to ensure he is always one step ahead of his enemies.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. Add 1 to the roll if the enemy unit is in combat with a friendly Chaos Legionnaires or Chaos Furies unit. On a 5+, that command has no effect. The command still counts as having been used and the command points spent to use the command are still lost.

warscrolls.name: Exalted Hero of Chaos
warscrolls.fluff: Exalted Heroes are those warriors who have caught the notice of the gods and now seek to make a true name for themselves. Their favoured prey are monsters and enemy champions, for by slaying these foes an Exalted Hero proves their own might.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Warriors of Chaos

abilities.name: Glory-seeker
abilities.lore: To earn the favour of their patron, these formidable warriors ruthlessly hunt down enemy monsters and champions.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Damage characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons for attacks that target HEROES or MONSTERS.

warscrolls.name: Fomoroid Crusher
warscrolls.fluff: Brutish creatures from a lost age, the Fomoroid Crushers now exist only to tear down and destroy. In battle they fly into a terrible rage, torturous memories of the creatures they once were lending their blows a maddened strength.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Monster, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness

abilities.name: Cursed Destroyers
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.lore: Once skilled masons, these creatures have been cursed by the Everchosen to now live only to destroy.
abilities.declare: Pick a terrain feature within 1" of this unit, then pick each other unit (friendly and enemy) within 3" of that terrain feature to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

warscrolls.name: Gaunt Summoner
warscrolls.fluff: To the daemonic Gaunt Summoners, reality is but a plaything. At the will of their master Archaon they lead armies of mortals to wreak terrible havoc. They can consume their foes in hellfire and manipulate realmgates to summon minions to their side in a matter of moments.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (2), Infantry, Ward (6+), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Daemon, Pledged to Tzeentch

abilities.name: Divert Realmgate
abilities.lore: Whispering fell incantations, a Gaunt Summoner can temporarily divert the path of a realmgate, allowing malefic Chaos entities to storm the battlefield.
abilities.declare: Make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Units set up this turn using this unit’s ‘Book of Profane Secrets’ ability can be set up wholly within 18" of this unit and more than 7" from all enemy units instead of the distances in the ability.

abilities.name: Book of Profane Secrets
abilities.lore: Using this arcane tome, the Gaunt Summoner calls forth minions from their Silver Tower.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly unit in a Silver Tower to be the target.
abilities.effect: Set up the target on the battlefield wholly within 12" of this unit and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Minions of the Silver Tower
abilities.lore: The warped fortresses of the Gaunt Summoners are infested with their thrall hosts.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly unit that has not been deployed to be the target.
abilities.effect: The target is set up in reserve in a Silver Tower. It has now been deployed.

warscrolls.name: Gaunt Summoner on Disc of Tzeentch
warscrolls.fluff: The Gaunt Summoners are strange daemon-sorcerers of Tzeentch bound to the will of the Everchosen. Some glide above the battlefield on scintillating Discs of Tzeentch, laying the enemy low with arcane power and cursed daggers.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (2), Cavalry, Fly, Ward (6+), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Daemon, Pledged to Tzeentch

abilities.name: Book of Profane Secrets
abilities.lore: Using this arcane tome, the Gaunt Summoner calls forth minions from their Silver Tower.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly unit in a Silver Tower to be the target.
abilities.effect: Set up the target on the battlefield wholly within 12" of this unit and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Arcane Imprisonment
abilities.lore: Gaunt Summoners delight in banishing foes to their Silver Towers.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy HERO in combat with this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: If the unmodified casting roll exceeds the target’s Health characteristic, it is automatically destroyed. For the rest of the battle, that unit cannot be picked to be the target of an ability that allows a replacement unit to be set up.

abilities.name: Minions of the Silver Tower
abilities.lore: The warped fortresses of the Gaunt Summoners are infested with their thrall hosts.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly unit that has not been deployed to be the target.
abilities.effect: The target is set up in reserve in a Silver Tower. It has now been deployed.

warscrolls.name: Godsworn Hunt
warscrolls.fluff: Guided by searing visions of conquest and glory, the Godspeaker known as Theddra Skull-scryer leads warriors from the Tribe of the Black Fang through a combination of ruthlessness and awesome displays of gods-given power. The Godsworn Hunt is formed of the greatest champions of the Tribe of the Black Fang. Each is a hardened killer who has earned their name through bloody deeds, and their bodies are bedecked with gruesome trophies and oathstones.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Champion, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Undivided, Darkoath

abilities.name: Oath of Conquest
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Hero Phase
abilities.lore: Heeding Theddra Skull-scryer’s proclamations, the Godsworn Hunt seek to earn glory by driving back the enemy.
abilities.effect: If this unit is contesting an objective you control that is wholly within enemy territory, this unit has WARD (5+) for the rest of the battle.

abilities.name: Theddra Skull-scryer
abilities.lore: Through fell energies do the Darkoath find communion with the Chaos Gods.
abilities.effect: While this unit’s Theddra Skull-scryer is on the battlefield, it has WIZARD (1).

warscrolls.name: Gorebeast Chariot
warscrolls.fluff: Only the most brutal of champions can hope to yoke one of the grotesque Gorebeasts to their will. These unnatural creatures lie somewhere between a monstrous simian and a Ghurish rokodile, and one swing of their fists can punch clean through a mortal’s chest. Once bludgeoned into submission, a Gorebeast’s strength allows them to pull a Chaos Chariot with relative ease. It is often more difficult to get the creature to stop, as they smash aside enemy regiments and barrel onwards in search of more foes to crush.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: War Machine, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Warriors of Chaos

abilities.name: Brutal Momentum
abilities.lore: The ferocity of Gorebeasts is terrible to behold as they carve a path of bloody destruction through the enemy ranks.
abilities.effect: When this unit uses the ‘Power Through’ command, inflict an additional D3 mortal damage on the target and add 3" to the distance this unit can move as part of that ability.

warscrolls.name: Gunnar Brand
warscrolls.fluff: Gunnar Brand is a legend amongst the Darkoath tribes of the eastern Great Parch. His warrior skills, coarse charisma and raw grit have seen him emerge triumphant against seemingly impossible odds time and again. Many whisper that Gunnar’s brother forged a deal with a Wilderfiend and that the Chaos Gods have their gaze upon him.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Infantry, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Darkoath, Gunnar’s Oathsworn

abilities.name: Oath of Bloodshed
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, End of Any Turn
abilities.lore: Though he is contemptuous of the gods, Gunnar is still Darkoath; he is not so foolish as to reject their boons should they seek to reward his murder-making.
abilities.declare: This unit can only use this ability if any enemy HEROES were slain by this unit’s combat attacks this turn.
abilities.effect: Friendly GUNNAR’S OATHSWORN units have WARD (4+) for the rest of the battle.

abilities.name: Carve a Path To Glory
abilities.lore: Ruthless in battle, Gunnar Brand closes in on the enemy’s champions, claiming skulls and earning glory with each swing of his axes.
abilities.declare: This unit can only use this ability if it is in combat with an enemy HERO.
abilities.effect: This unit can use 2 FIGHT abilities this phase. After the first is used, however, this unit has STRIKE-LAST for the rest of the turn. When using the second FIGHT ability, this unit must pick an enemy HERO to be the target of all of its attacks.

warscrolls.name: Horns of Hashut
warscrolls.fluff: The Horns of Hashut are bringers of ruin and desolation, heralds sent forth by the Father of Darkness to claim territories in advance of his marching legions. Each region they conquer is pulverised, rendered empty and barren.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion (1/10), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Undivided

abilities.name: Stampede of Iron
abilities.lore: The Horns of Hashut wage war with brutal, overwhelming violence, crashing into enemy lines with ferocious impact before delivering bone-crushing strikes from their fell-forged weapons.
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each model in this unit that is within the target’s combat range. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target. If 3 or more mortal damage is inflicted on the target by this ability, subtract 1 from hit rolls for the target’s combat attacks for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Iron Golem
warscrolls.fluff: Skilled blacksmiths, the Iron Golem believe themselves chosen to provide arms and armour to Archaon’s forces. Amongst the war-wracked lands of Chamon, their legions are renowned for their dauntless resilience and chilling efficiency.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion (1/8), Standard Bearer (1/8), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Undivided

abilities.name: Iron Resilience
abilities.lore: At a barked command from their Dominar, the Iron Golem snap into an impenetrable shieldwall.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to save rolls for this unit if it has not used a MOVE ability in the same turn.

abilities.name: Ogor Breacher
abilities.lore: With their masterforged armour and unwavering spirit, an Ogor Breacher can weather all manner of blows.
abilities.effect: While this unit includes an Ogor Breacher, ignore the first damage point that would be allocated to this unit in each phase.

warscrolls.name: Khagra's Ravagers
warscrolls.fluff: Having usurped command from her sister, Zarshia Bittersoul, Khagra leads her warriors on the Path to Glory as they seek to earn the favour of the Dark Gods. While Zarshia has lost command of her warriors to her sister, her mastery over sorcery is no less diminished and this rivalry has further fuelled her dark ambitions.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Champion, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Warriors of Chaos

abilities.name: Ravagers of the Mortal Realms
abilities.lore: The profane acts of Khagra’s Ravagers are rewarded by the Dark Gods, who seek nothing more than the desecration of the Mortal Realms themselves.
abilities.effect: This unit has WARD (5+) while it is contesting an objective you control.

abilities.name: Zarshia Bittersoul
abilities.lore: Zarshia mastery over sorcery fuels her dark ambitions.
abilities.effect: While this unit’s Zarshia Bittersoul is on the battlefield, it has WIZARD (1).

warscrolls.name: Mindstealer Sphiranx
warscrolls.fluff: Mindstealer Sphiranxes are powerful and sinister telepaths. These cruel-hearted beasts enjoy nothing more than toying with their prey, plundering their innermost secrets before summarily ripping them to shreds with sharpened claws.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Monster, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness

abilities.name: Dominate Mind
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.lore: A Sphiranx can manipulate the actions of its enemies with a simple glance.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit within 6" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. If the roll exceeds the target’s Control characteristic, the target has STRIKE-LAST for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Mutalith Vortex Beast
warscrolls.fluff: Within the pulsating star suspended above the back of a Mutalith Vortex Beast can be found a portal to the Realm of Chaos itself. These horrific monsters constantly seethe with the power of mutation, those around them rewrought into horrific forms.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Monster, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Daemon, Pledged to Tzeentch

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Betentacled Maw is 8.

abilities.name: Mutant Regeneration
abilities.lore: This unnatural abomination is invigorated by the raw power of Chaos.
abilities.effect: Heal (D3) this unit.

abilities.name: Aura of Mutation
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.lore: To stand near a Mutalith can have horrific consequences.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice and apply the corresponding effect below. If this unit is wholly within 12" of a friendly PLEDGED TO TZEENTCH WIZARD, you can roll 2 dice instead, pick either result, then apply the corresponding effect below.

1 - Untouched
No effect.

2 - Hideous Disfigurement
Subtract 3 from the target’s control score until the start of your next turn.

3 - Troggbrains
The target cannot use commands for the rest of the turn.

4 - Gift of Mutations
Subtract 1" from the target’s Move characteristic for the rest of the battle.

5 - Horrific Absorption
Inflict D6 mortal damage on the target. Then, Heal (D6) this unit.

6 - Transmogrification
Pick any other effect.

warscrolls.name: Nexus Chaotica
warscrolls.fluff: True champions of Chaos recognise that the gods demand more than simple slaughter. The realms themselves must be laced with taint; the arcane ley lines must be inundated with corruption. This is the purpose of the Nexus Chaotica, a shrine raised at a geomantic confluence for the express purpose of withering it.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Faction Terrain, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness

abilities.name: Corrupt The Realms
abilities.lore: These diabolical constructs use harnessed daemonic power to corrupt the geomantic energy of the Mortal Realms.
abilities.declare: If this terrain feature has 9 or more power points, pick an objective or terrain feature within 24" of this terrain feature to be the source. Then, pick any number of enemy units within 3" of the source to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Remove 9 power points from this terrain feature, then roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Infernal Sorcery
abilities.lore: A sorcerer of Chaos can draw upon the bound daemons of the Nexus Chaotica to empower their spellcasting.
abilities.declare: If this terrain feature has 3 or more power points, pick a friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS WIZARD within 3" of this terrain feature to be the target.
abilities.effect: Remove 3 power points from this terrain feature, then add 1 to casting rolls for the target for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Draw Power
abilities.lore: Constructed at confluences where magical ley lines converge, a Nexus Chaotica can draw power from the realms and into a floating crucible.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. Give a number of power points to this terrain feature equal to the roll. This terrain feature can have a maximum of 12 power points at once.

warscrolls.name: Ogroid Myrmidon
warscrolls.fluff: Myrmidons are masters of the Varanspire’s fighting pits, and have spent decades mastering the gladiatorial arts. In battle they lead those who seek to join the Everchosen’s legions, for to impress a Myrmidon is to be marked for glory.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness

abilities.name: Pit Master
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for this unit
abilities.lore: Myrmidons are given governance over the gladiatorial pits of the Varanspire, and all who have fought there willingly follow them into the fray.
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly Ogroid Theridons unit that has not used a FIGHT ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a FIGHT ability immediately after the FIGHT ability used by this unit has been resolved. If it is picked to do so, add 1 to hit rolls for the target’s attacks for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Myrmidon Rage
abilities.lore: Every wound inflicted on a Myrmidon only serves to stoke its rage further.
abilities.effect: While this unit is damaged, add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of its melee weapons.

warscrolls.name: Ogroid Theridons
warscrolls.fluff: Serving as shock troops to the armies of Chaos, these formidable warriors are found where the fighting is thickest, wielding both monstrous strength and honed martial skill to carve swathes of ruin through the ranks of the enemy.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/3), Standard Bearer (1/3), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness

abilities.name: Unleashed Savagery
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
abilities.lore: Suppressing their savage spirit no more, these ferocious warriors hack at the foe in a bestial frenzy.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Damage characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Raptoryx
warscrolls.fluff: One of the many forms of wildlife twisted by the power of Chaos, Raptoryx cross the land in vast flocks. Cunning and vicious beasts, they are willing to take on prey many times their size, pulling them down in a frenzy of slashing talons and snapping beaks.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Beast, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness

abilities.name: Beast
abilities.effect: This unit has a maximum control score of 1.

abilities.name: Crazed Flock
abilities.lore: A flock of snapping, screeching Raptoryx is capable of swiftly bringing down any prey should they catch them unawares.
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this turn, for the rest of the turn, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of its melee weapons. This ability also affects Companion weapons.

warscrolls.name: Realmscourge Rupture
warscrolls.fluff: Realmscourge Ruptures are not subtle weapons. When the necessary magical power has been channelled and released by a tribal shaman, the land itself writhes in the grip of Chaos, sharpened spikes surging forth like an accursed tidal wave to overwhelm anything in their path.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Manifestation, Endless Spell, Fly, Ward (6+), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness

abilities.name: Debilitating Shockwave
abilities.lore: The vicious spikes that erupt from an onrushing Realmscourge Rupture impale those unfortunate enough to be struck by them even as the tremors that accompany them send those nearby staggering.
abilities.declare: If this MANIFESTATION charged this phase, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each model in the target unit. For each 6, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target. If any models in the target unit are slain by this ability, subtract 1 from hit rolls for the target’s attacks for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Scions of the Flame
warscrolls.fluff: The Scions of the Flame seek nothing less than to immolate the realms in a tide of fire. Natives of Aqshy, they are zealous worshippers of Chaos as the Ever-Raging Flame, and delight in bringing burning death to their foes.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion (1/8), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Undivided

abilities.name: All Shall Burn
abilities.lore: Hungry flames spread through the enemy’s ranks and engulf their war machines as the Scions bombard the foe with burning projectiles.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Damage characteristic of this unit’s Flameburst Pots and Infernal Fires for attacks that target WAR MACHINES or INFANTRY units with 10 or more models.

warscrolls.name: Scourge of Ghyran Abraxia, Spear of the Everchosen
warscrolls.fluff: Few of the Dark Gods’ champions have wrought more horror upon the Everspring Swathe than Abraxia, the Spear of the Everchosen. She has sworn to drown the jungles in the blood of her foes and charges into battle at the head of a vast Chaos horde. Her warriors dread her anger and will obey whatever order she gives, no matter how likely it is to result in their gruesome deaths.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Monster, Ward (5+), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Warriors of Chaos

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of The Thanatorg’s Claws and Fangs is 4.

abilities.name: Mutative Spear
abilities.lore: Gorbolga the Accurs’d causes rampant mutation in its victims, their twisted, mewling remains a source of absolute horror to their surviving allies.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that had any damage points allocated to it this turn by this unit’s combat attacks to be the target.
abilities.effect: The target has a maximum control score of 1 for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Unending Will To Conquer
abilities.lore: Abraxia once consumed the flesh of the High Anointed of the Temple of the Ur-Phoenix, an act swiftly followed by her desecration of the sacred flame at the shrine’s heart. Now, when the thrill of battle ignites within her, the power of rebirth sees her wounds rapidly heal over as if they had never occurred.
abilities.effect: If this unit is contesting an objective you do not control. Heal (D6) this unit.

abilities.name: Champion of the Undivided
abilities.lore: Abraxia’s fell reputation inspires her followers to embark on murderous rampages to gain her attention – perhaps even her approval. Such success is rare, but the resulting carnage is unquestionable.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly non-UNIQUE SLAVES TO DARKNESS unit wholly within 12" of this unit and that does not have a Pledge to Chaos keyword to be the target.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to the Rend characteristic of melee weapons used by the target while they are contesting an objective you do not control.

abilities.name: Unstoppable Invasion
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase
abilities.lore: Demonstrating its legendary ferocity, the Thanatorg smashes through the ranks of the foe.
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Inflict D3 mortal damage on the target. Then, roll 2D6. This unit can move a distance up to the value of the roll. It can pass through models in the target unit but must end that move in combat.

warscrolls.name: Singri Brand
warscrolls.fluff: Singri is the daughter of Gunnar Brand, heir apparent to the Darkoath tribes of the Snow Peaks. She charges into battle with a brash ferocity, one that often vexes her father, yet none are as capable as she at teasing out speed from a warhorse, nor as skilled in loosing pinpoint arrows while galloping at full tilt as Singri.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Cavalry, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Darkoath, Gunnar’s Oathsworn

abilities.name: Swift As The Wind
abilities.lore: Singri’s horsemanship is unrivalled by any of the Darkoath. She weaves deftly across the battlefield, avoiding enemy fire and loosing deadly accurate shots with her bow in return..
abilities.effect: Only critical hits score successful hits for shooting attacks that target this unit.

abilities.name: Uncanny Shot
abilities.lore: Gunnar Brand has been saved on more than one occasion by a well-placed arrow from Singri.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of this unit’s Singri’s Warbow for attacks that target enemy units that are within 6" of a friendly Gunnar Brand.

warscrolls.name: Slaughterbrute
warscrolls.fluff: Even the greatest champions cannot hope to bind a Slaughterbrute through physical might alone. Only through specially forged blades of binding can these monstrosities be controlled, and their boundless fury directed towards their master’s enemies.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Monster, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Daemon, Pledged to Khorne

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Razor-tipped Claws is 5.

abilities.name: Rampaging Charge
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase
abilities.lore: The Slaughterbrute crashes into the enemy’s ranks in a frenzy of destruction.
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll. If the target unit is INFANTRY, double the amount of mortal damage inflicted.

abilities.name: Sigils of Domination
abilities.lore: By carving runes of domination into a Slaughterbrute’s back and driving cursed blades of binding into its flesh, the monster’s will can be bound to a champion of Chaos.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS HERO within this unit’s combat range to be this unit’s master.
abilities.effect:
For the rest of the battle, while this unit is within its master’s combat range:
• Add 1 to the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for this unit, to a maximum of 3.
• This unit can ignore the effects of the Companion weapon ability on its weapons.

warscrolls.name: Soul Grinder
warscrolls.fluff: Sometimes, when a daemon is banished in an especially humiliating fashion, their bitterness will lead them to seek the insane overseers of the Forge of Souls. To these seekers is offered a bargain: an opportunity to re-enter the Mortal Realms far sooner than the terms of banishment typically allows in exchange for paying a tithe of souls to the forgemasters. Daemons who accept these stipulations are transformed; they become Soul Grinders, fusions of metal and raw Chaotic energy, unleashed upon the hapless realms.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Monster, Ward (6+), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Daemon

melee.name: Piston-driven Legs and Daemonic Blade or Claw

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Piston-driven Legs and Daemonic Blade or Claw is 6.

abilities.name: Implacable Advance
abilities.lore: This daemonic engine is utterly relentless in its desire to pay off the soul-tithe owed to its masters.
abilities.effect: This unit can use CHARGE abilities even if it used a RUN ability in the same turn.

abilities.name: Piston-driven Carnage
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.lore: The mechanical lower limbs of a Soul Grinder crush, stamp and impale without mercy.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy INFANTRY unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll. Then, this unit can move 6". During that move, it can pass through models in the target unit but must end that move in combat.

warscrolls.name: Spire Tyrants
warscrolls.fluff: Each member of the Spire Tyrants has earned glory and renown in the fighting pits of the Varanspire. These ferocious gladiators constantly seek new and deadlier challenges, believing themselves to be favoured by Archaon himself.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion (1/9), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Undivided

abilities.name: Fight For Glory
abilities.lore: In battle, the Spire Tyrants seek the favour of powerful warlords and will fight harder in their presence.
abilities.effect: The first time each turn that this unit is picked to use a FIGHT ability in the combat phase, if this unit is wholly within 12" of any friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS HEROES, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Splintered Fang
warscrolls.fluff: The mystic leaders of the Splintered Fang lead their people in worship of the Coiling Ones, serpentine daemons who embody cunning and might. Poison is the greatest weapon of the Fangs, and a single cut from their blades can prove fatal.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion (1/9), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Undivided

abilities.name: Paralysing Strikes
abilities.lore: Those struck by the blades of the Splintered Fang may find their limbs turning leaden and their thoughts becoming clouded as the cult’s venoms work their way into the blood.
abilities.effect: Each time this unit uses a FIGHT ability, if its attacks score 2 or more critical hits against the same enemy unit, that unit has STRIKE‑LAST for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Slithering Serpents
abilities.lore: Creatures of the Coiling Ones, a tangle of venomous snakes accompanies the Splintered Fang into battle.
abilities.declare: If this unit’s Serpents are on the battlefield, pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 1, remove this unit’s Serpents from the battlefield. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

warscrolls.name: Tarantulos Brood
warscrolls.fluff: Worshippers of a dark power called the Eightfold Watcher, these strange and sinister warriors have wrought dark rituals of tainted arachnid blood and varanite upon their flesh to alter their form to be a dark mirror of their master.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion (1/13), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Undivided

abilities.name: Creeping Summons
abilities.lore: The Broodmasters of the Eightfold Watcher have a strange and dark symbiosis with the swarms of venomous spiders that accompany them, calling forth an ever-growing horde that can overwhelm the enemy.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, you can return D3 slain Spider Swarms to this unit.

warscrolls.name: The Gnarlspirit Pack
warscrolls.fluff: Sarrakkar Blackwing is the hunt-shaman of the Gnarlspirit Pack. This gaunt and savage figure communes with the mysterious entities to whom his warriors have pledged themselves, translating their growls into commands and their fury into dark sorcery. The Gnarlspirit Pack are Darkoath warriors in thrall to monstrous spirits. These entities demand a tribute of slaughter and atrocity – and so long as these warriors can wet their blades with warm blood, they are eager to comply.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Champion, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Undivided, Darkoath

abilities.name: Oath of Dark Sacrifice
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Hero Phase
abilities.lore: Sarrakkar Blackwing spits forth a vile curse, pledging to offer up the souls of his enemies and thereby quench the thirst of the Dark Gods.
abilities.effect: If an unmodified casting roll for this unit this phase was 8+, this unit has WARD (5+) for the rest of the battle.

abilities.name: Sarrakkar Blackwing
abilities.lore: Sarrakkar channels the howling fury of the beast-spirits to power his sorcery.
abilities.effect: While this unit’s Sarrakkar Blackwing is on the battlefield, it has WIZARD (1).

warscrolls.name: The Oathsworn Kin
warscrolls.fluff: Gunnar Brand is a hero amongst the Darkoath tribes of Aqshy, but he could not have won his greatest victories without the aid of his companions. The Oathsworn Kin form his closest circle of confidants – Dendrel Direbrand and Warqueen Tanari cave in skulls with hammer and spear while Broken Nadja trails behind, her deadly incantations reducing foes to madness.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Darkoath, Gunnar’s Oathsworn

abilities.name: Withering Death
abilities.lore: Nadja spits a vile curse in the Dark Tongue, drawing unnatural shadows to coil around an enemy champion and sap their life force.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy HERO within 18" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Inflict 1 mortal damage on the target and subtract 1 from the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Broken Nadja
abilities.lore: Broken Nadja wields the energies of ruin itself through dark incantations.
abilities.effect: While this unit’s Broken Nadja is on the battlefield, it has WIZARD (1).

warscrolls.name: The Unmade
warscrolls.fluff: The island of Tzlid, drifting ever closer to the Shyish Nadir, is home to the cannibal tribes of the Unmade. The self-mutilation performed by these pain worshippers is horrifying to behold, and their leaders are visions from the darkest of nightmares.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion (1/9), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Undivided

abilities.name: Frozen In Fear
abilities.lore: The self-inflicted mutilation performed by the Unmade is a sight disturbing enough to momentarily freeze even a veteran warrior in horror.
abilities.effect: Enemy units cannot use the ‘Redeploy’ or ‘Rally’ commands while they are within 12" of this unit.

warscrolls.name: Untamed Beasts
warscrolls.fluff: By devouring the flesh of Ghur’s many predators, the Untamed Beasts seek to gain their strength and power. These shamanistic savages worship Chaos as the Devourer of Existence and are peerless trackers and hunters.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion (1/9), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Undivided

abilities.name: Unleash The Beast
abilities.lore: With bursts of primal energy, the Untamed Beasts chase down their enemies with relentless fervour.
abilities.effect: This unit can use the ‘Normal Move’ ability as if it were your movement phase.

abilities.name: Jagged Harpoon
abilities.lore: Upon piercing the enemy’s flesh, the serrated edges of a First Fang’s harpoon shred vital organs; the more the target thrashes about, the more severe the internal damage.
abilities.declare: If this unit includes a First Fang, pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. If the target is a BEAST or MONSTER, roll a dice instead. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

warscrolls.name: Varanguard
warscrolls.fluff: Each of the Varanguard is a mighty champion who has passed the many tests set for them by Archaon and sworn themselves to his service. Riding atop their hulking steeds, these lords of darkness bring inescapable death to the Everchosen’s enemies.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Warriors of Chaos

abilities.name: Relentless Killers
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
abilities.lore: The Varanguard have slaughtered foes beyond counting, butchering their way across the battlefields of the Mortal Realms without mercy.
abilities.effect: This unit can use 2 FIGHT abilities this phase. After the first is used, however, this unit has STRIKE-LAST for the rest of the turn.

rules.name: Paragons of Darkness
rules.lore: Those who have long walked the Path to Glory and bear the scars and mutations to prove it are some of the most dangerous warriors in all the Mortal Realms.
rules.effect: Add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly non-MONSTER SLAVES TO DARKNESS HEROES.

rules.name: United in Darkness
rules.lore: The myriad forces of Chaos march to war under a common cause, led by warlords who have put aside their rivalries in the name of laying waste to the lands of a shared foe.
rules.effect: While there is at least 1 friendly WARRIORS OF CHAOS HERO and 1 other friendly DAEMON HERO or DARKOATH HERO on the battlefield, add 2 to the control scores of friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS units while they are contesting an objective that is wholly outside friendly territory.

rules.name: Devotees of Ruin
rules.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
rules.lore: Though the Darkoath do not know the true significance of the Dark Gods’ runes, when armour-clad warriors bearing those same sigils arrive in their lands, these visitors are often hailed as divine crusaders sent to save them.
rules.declare: Pick a friendly WARRIORS OF CHAOS unit. Then, pick up to 2 visible friendly DARKOATH units that do not have a Pledge to Chaos keyword and are wholly within 12" of that WARRIORS OF CHAOS unit to be the targets.
rules.effect: Until the start of your next turn, the targets have the same Pledge to Chaos keyword as that WARRIORS OF CHAOS unit.

rules.name: Rally The Tribes
rules.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
rules.lore: One of the horde’s commanders looses a terrifying battle cry, calling more of their blade-sworn warriors to their side.
rules.declare: If there is a friendly DARKOATH HERO on the battlefield, pick a friendly non-HERO non‑UNIQUE DARKOATH unit that has been destroyed to be the target.
rules.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, set up a replacement unit with half the number of models from the target unit (rounding up) on the battlefield, wholly within 6" of a battlefield edge and more than 3" from all enemy units.

rules.name: Feral Ruin
rules.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for a friendly Daemon Prince unit
rules.lore: A Daemon Prince’s unholy radiance draws to them the most savage of chaotic creatures, abominations against nature that hunger to spill blood.
rules.effect: Pick a friendly non-HERO SLAVES TO DARKNESS MONSTER or BEAST unit that has not used a FIGHT ability this turn and is wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target. The target can be picked to use a FIGHT ability immediately after the FIGHT ability used by this unit has been resolved.

rules.name: Ironclad Onslaught
rules.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Your Turn
rules.lore: When a Chaos horde is on the march, the realms tremble. Hundreds of heavily armoured warriors desecrate all in their path as they roar oaths to the Dark Pantheon.
rules.declare: Pick an objective that is contested by any friendly units to be the target.
rules.effect: Place a defiled token next to the target objective. Then, roll a D3 for each enemy unit contesting an objective that has a friendly defiled token. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that enemy unit equal to the roll.

artefacts.name: Black Ritual Dagger
artefacts.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn, Reaction: You declared a SPELL ability for a friendly unit wholly within 12" of this unit
artefacts.lore: Dark tendrils of chaotic magic coil around this obsidian blade. The bearer’s mind is filled with promises of arcane power if its thirst for blood is quenched.
artefacts.effect: Allocate 1 damage point to this unit. Then, you can re-roll the casting roll.

artefacts.name: Grand Offering
artefacts.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Any Movement Phase
artefacts.lore: Before the battle, sacrifices were heaped before the lair of a particularly dreaded Wilderfiend known to haunt the region.
artefacts.declare: Pick a friendly SNOW PEAKS Wilderfiend within 9" of this unit to be the target.
artefacts.effect: Give the target D6 sacrifice points.

artefacts.name: The Varanite Shackle
artefacts.lore: This writhing torque radiates an aura that twists reality, aiding those who serve the will of the Dark Gods yet are blind or indifferent to the import of their actions.
artefacts.effect: Friendly non-WARRIORS OF CHAOS SLAVES TO DARKNESS units have WARD (6+) while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

artefacts.name: Amulet of Chaos
artefacts.lore: Life, death, creation, obliteration. Maddening potential swirls within the gemstone set in this talisman. It need only be loosed by belief.
artefacts.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the enemy target. Then, you can pick a friendly DARKOATH INFANTRY unit in combat with that enemy unit to be the friendly target.
artefacts.effect:
Roll a D3. On a 2+:

• Inflict an amount of mortal damage on the enemy target equal to the roll.
• If there is a friendly target, return a number of slain models to it equal to the roll.

artefacts.name: Head of the Unworthy
artefacts.lore: This grim trophy is a bleak reminder that the gods’ favour, even if earned over centuries of battle, can be lost and bestowed on another in a heartbeat.
artefacts.effect: If a friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS HERO with any Dark Apotheosis points is destroyed, give this unit 8 Dark Apotheosis points.
