artefacts.name: The Conqueror's Crown
artefacts.lore: This blasphemous diadem grants the bearer dominion over the minds of lesser mortals.
artefacts.effect: Subtract 5 from the control scores of enemy INFANTRY units while they are in combat with this unit.

artefacts.name: Infernal Puppet
artefacts.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Start of Any Turn
artefacts.lore: As it dances upon the aetheric winds, this eldritch marionette violently disrupts the spellcraft of enemy mages.
artefacts.declare: Pick a visible enemy WIZARD within 24" of this unit to be the target.
artefacts.effect: For the rest of the turn, each time the target is picked to use a SPELL ability, inflict D3 mortal damage on the target as a reaction. If the target is destroyed by this ability, do not resolve the effect of that SPELL ability.

artefacts.name: Realmwarper's Twist-rune
artefacts.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Hero Phase
artefacts.lore: One who bears this cursed rune can bind warped landscapes to their will. Ruptured chasms open as thick palls of dark energy obscure the favoured and their servants from view.
artefacts.declare: Pick a terrain feature within 12" of this unit to be the target.
artefacts.effect: If the target does not have the ‘Obscuring’ terrain ability, it gains that ability until the start of your next turn. Then, roll a dice for each model (friendly and enemy) within 1" of the target. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on that model’s unit.

heroicTraits.name: Dread Marshal
heroicTraits.lore: This mighty warrior has proved their devotion to Be’lakor above all, and their loyalty has been rewarded with a host of warriors to command.
heroicTraits.declare: Pick up to 3 friendly units wholly within 12" of this unit to be targets.
heroicTraits.effect: Add 1 to charge rolls for the targets for the rest of the turn.

heroicTraits.name: Oath of Kinship
heroicTraits.lore: Before the eyes of their fellow tribe members, this chieftain has made a bold oath that they are compelled to honour in order to reaffirm their right to rule.
heroicTraits.effect: While this unit is within the combat range of another friendly SNOW PEAKS unit, add 1 to hit rolls for this unit’s attacks.

heroicTraits.name: Radiance of Dark Glory
heroicTraits.lore: In the presence of this champion, the mutative energies of Chaos can seal shut even the most grievous of wounds.
heroicTraits.declare: Pick each damaged friendly unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the targets.
heroicTraits.effect: Roll a dice for each target. On a 3+, Heal (1) the target. Heal (3) the target instead if it is a MONSTER.

heroicTraits.name: Deathmonger
heroicTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
heroicTraits.lore: Feared across the realms, this hero leaves naught in their wake but a trail of sun-bleached bones.
heroicTraits.effect: This unit can use 2 FIGHT abilities this phase. After the first is used, however, this unit has STRIKE-LAST for the rest of the turn.

heroicTraits.name: Favoured of the Pantheon
heroicTraits.lore: The gods watch this warlord’s deeds particularly closely.
heroicTraits.effect: If this unit is picked as the target of the ‘Eye of the Gods’ ability, it gains 3 Dark Apotheosis points.

other.name: The Grimroot Order
other.lore: Corruption suffuses these warriors so deeply that it is said they can endure wounds that would slay even fellow Varanguard.
other.effect: Add 1 to this unit’s Health characteristic.

other.name: Betrayers of the Anvilking
other.lore: To earn Archaon’s favour, these former apprentices of an ancient smith-lord betrayed their master but preserved his secrets of forgecraft.

other.name: The Blackstorm Apostates
other.lore: These warriors are a rare prize indeed for the Everchosen: Azyrites who have embraced Chaos and speed themselves with imprisoned and tortured celestial winds.
other.effect: Add 3" to this unit’s Move characteristic.

other.name: Tamers of Haradh's Torment
other.lore: The steeds of these knights once roamed Haradh’s Torment, where a gargant warlord roused the beasts of the Eightpoints to challenge Archaon – and was later punished for it.
other.effect: Add 1 to the Damage characteristic of this unit’s Companion weapons.

other.name: The Hounds Apocalyptus
other.lore: These champions have ridden far across the realms and are rabid in seizing whatever the Everchosen deems a worthy prize.
other.effect: While this unit is wholly within enemy territory, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons.

other.name: The Eroding Icon
other.lore: As this fell icon arrives upon the enemy line, warriors find their weapons corroding and crumbling to rust.
other.effect:
This unit has the PLEDGED TO NURGLE keyword.

In addition, while this unit includes any standard bearers, attacks that target this unit cannot score critical hits (treat them as regular hits instead).

other.name: The Blasted Standard
other.lore: Woven from threads of dark magic, this standard is inscribed with writhing runes and surrounded with the coruscating fires of change.
other.effect:
This unit has the PLEDGED TO TZEENTCH keyword.

In addition, while this unit includes any standard bearers, this unit has WARD (4+) against damage inflicted by shooting attacks.

other.name: The Banner of Rage
other.lore: Sewn from strings of congealed gore, this banner radiates bloodlust so strong that those beneath it are goaded into a state of permanent rage.
other.effect:
This unit has the PLEDGED TO KHORNE keyword.

In addition, while this unit includes any standard bearers, add 1 to wound rolls for this unit’s combat attacks.

other.name: The Banner of Screaming Flesh
other.lore: Fashioned from flayed aelven faces that scream in perpetual agony, the exhilarating pitch of this banner heightens the senses of the followers of the Dark Prince.
other.effect:
This unit has the PLEDGED TO SLAANESH keyword.

In addition, while this unit includes any standard bearers, if this unit charged this turn, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

other.name: The Dread Banner
other.lore: Marked with sigils of each of the Dark Gods, the bearers of this banner strike fear into those who oppose them.
other.effect: While this unit includes any standard bearers, enemy units cannot use commands while they are in combat with this unit.

other.name: Bellow of Gorkamorka
other.lore: Goroan shamans who maintain the old ways channel the sense-blasting roars of Gorkamorka through their magic.
other.declare: Pick the Ogroid Thaumaturge in this Regiment of Renown to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
other.effect: The target has STRIKE-LAST until the start of your next turn. In addition, while the target has the BURNING keyword, subtract 1 from hit rolls for the target until the start of your next turn.

other.name: Goroan Forgecraft
other.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
other.lore: The Goroans were renowned for their skill at smithery, and even orruks will acknowledge their general killiness.
other.declare: Pick a friendly DESTRUCTION HERO that is within the combat range of a HERO in this Regiment of Renown to be the target.
other.effect: On a 3+, add 1 to the Rend characteristic of the target’s melee weapons until the start of your next turn.

other.name: Ironclad Despoilers
other.lore: Punching into the enemy lines like a mailed fist, once these warriors have taken a vital position on the battlefield, little can be done to wrest control from them.
other.effect:
Add 1 to save rolls for units in this Regiment of Renown while they are contesting an objective you control.

Add 1 to wound rolls for units in this Regiment of Renown while they are contesting an objective you do not control.

other.name: Godmarked Legion
other.lore: The mightiest of warriors in the godmarked legions of Chaos can be elevated to daemonhood should their patron deem them worthy.
other.effect:
The unit in this Regiment of Renown gains the ‘Gifts of Chaos’ ability and one of the following faction keywords that matches your army’s faction:

• BLADES OF KHORNE
• DISCIPLES OF TZEENTCH
• MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE
• HEDONITES OF SLAANESH

other.name: Gifts of Chaos
other.lore: This daemon takes to the field redolent with god-given gifts.
other.effect:
• If this unit has the BLADES OF KHORNE keyword, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of its Hellforged Weapons and its Hellforged Weapons have the Blood-Hungry weapon ability.

• If this unit has the DISCIPLES OF TZEENTCH keyword, it has WIZARD (1).

• If this unit has the MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE keyword, it has WARD (5+).

• If this unit has the HEDONITES OF SLAANESH keyword, add 1 run rolls and charge rolls for it.

other.name: Favour of the Gods
other.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
other.lore: Whether it pleases him or not, Gunnar Brand has attracted the notice of the Chaos Gods. With each worthy kill he makes, he draws down their blessings.
other.effect:
If any enemy HEROES were slain this turn by the Gunnar Brand in this Regiment of Renown:

• Heal (5) each unit in this Regiment of Renown.
• Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by units in this Regiment of Renown for the rest of the battle.

other.name: Bestial Domination
other.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for a unit in this Regiment of Renown
other.lore: Their self-preserving instincts crushed by their master’s brute will, Hargax’s beasts attack without relent.
other.effect: Pick a unit in this Regiment of Renown that has not used a FIGHT ability this turn to be the target. The target can be picked to use a FIGHT ability immediately after the FIGHT ability used by this unit has been resolved.

battleTraits.name: First-Damned Prince
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Passive
battleTraits.lore: Be’lakor courts the favour of all of the Chaos Gods to crush his foes. In battle, he surrounds himself with their lesser daemons to do his bidding.
battleTraits.effect:
While a friendly Be’lakor is within the combat range of any friendly non-HERO LEGION OF THE FIRST PRINCE DAEMON units:

• That friendly Be’lakor has WARD (4+).

• In addition, each time you make a successful ward roll for that friendly Be’lakor, allocate 1 damage point to a friendly non-HERO LEGION OF THE FIRST PRINCE DAEMON unit within Be’lakor’s combat range after the damage sequence for Be’lakor has been resolved (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

battleTraits.name: Storm of Blackened Blades
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Your Combat Phase
battleTraits.lore: Eternus commands the mortal legions sworn to Be’lakor to bring ruin to all who dare oppose the First Prince.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly Eternus that is in combat and up to 2 friendly non-HERO non-DAEMON LEGION OF THE FIRST PRINCE units wholly within 12" of that Eternus to be the targets.
battleTraits.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the targets’ melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

battleTraits.name: Daemonic Reinforcements
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Movement Phase
battleTraits.lore: Lesser daemons bound to the Dark Master’s will are summoned forth from the Realm of Chaos to swell Be’lakor’s ranks.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly non-HERO LEGION OF THE FIRST PRINCE DAEMON INFANTRY or CAVALRY unit that has been destroyed to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: Set up a replacement unit with half the number of models from the target unit (rounding up) wholly within 12" of a friendly Be’lakor and more than 9" from all enemy units.

battleTraits.name: Bestow Favour
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
battleTraits.lore: The Great Game plays out in the blackened skies above the First Prince’s legions as oaths are sworn, enemies are crushed, and dark rewards are granted.
battleTraits.declare: If a friendly Be’lakor is on the battlefield, pick a non-HERO LEGION OF THE FIRST PRINCE unit to be the target.
battleTraits.effect:
Until the start of your next turn:
• Add 5 to the target’s control score.
• If the target is a DAEMON unit, add 1 to save rolls for the target.
• If the target is a non-DAEMON unit, it has WARD (6+).

battleTraits.name: Shroud of the Pale Elk
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Phase (Army), Reaction: Opponent declared an ATTACK ability
battleTraits.lore: A thick, shimmering miasma swirls around these warriors, surrounding them in fractal mirages that confuse the foe and cause them to strike at nothing but thin air.
battleTraits.effect: If that friendly SNOW PEAKS unit has not used an OATH ability this turn, spend 1 oath point. For the rest of the turn, that friendly unit has WARD (4+).

battleTraits.name: Hunger of Shesh'shan
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Phase (Army), Your Combat Phase
battleTraits.lore: Possessed by a wild euphoria, these warriors launch themselves at the foe with abandon, gloating as they revel in the screams and arterial sprays of blood.
battleTraits.declare: If you have 1 or more oath points, pick a friendly SNOW PEAKS unit that has not used an OATH ability this turn to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: Spend 1 oath point. For the rest of the turn, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons.

battleTraits.name: Daemonfire Weapons
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Phase (Army), Your Combat Phase
battleTraits.lore: As if kissed by the breath of the Chimera, the weapons of these warriors blaze with black flames that make a mockery of armour.
battleTraits.declare: If you have 1 or more oath points, pick a friendly SNOW PEAKS unit that has not used an OATH ability this turn to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: Spend 1 oath point. For the rest of the turn, add 1 to the Rend characteristic of the target’s melee weapons.

battleTraits.name: Speed of the Blood Crow
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Phase (Army), Your Charge Phase
battleTraits.lore: A single scarlet crow flies in the skies above, imbuing these warriors with a supernatural swiftness and predatory focus.
battleTraits.declare: If you have 1 or more oath points, pick a friendly SNOW PEAKS unit that has not used an OATH ability this turn to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: Spend 1 oath point. For the rest of the turn, the target can use CHARGE abilities even if it used a RUN ability in the same turn.

battleTraits.name: Rage of Arkhar
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Phase (Army), Your Combat Phase
battleTraits.lore: Unholy anger is stoked in the hearts of these warriors, filling them with hate-fuelled stamina.
battleTraits.declare: If you have 1 or more oath points, pick a friendly SNOW PEAKS unit that has not used an OATH ability this turn to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: Spend 2 oath points. The target can use 2 FIGHT abilities this phase. After the first is used, however, the target has STRIKE‑LAST for the rest of the turn.

battleTraits.name: Messengers of the Gods
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Phase (Army), End of Any Turn
battleTraits.declare: If you have 1 or more oath points, pick a friendly SNOW PEAKS Darkoath Marauders or Fellriders unit that has been destroyed and has not used an OATH ability this turn to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: Spend 2 oath points. Set up a replacement unit with half the number of models from the target unit (rounding up) on the battlefield, wholly within 6" of a battlefield edge and more than 3" from all enemy units.

battleTraits.name: Pledges to the Dark Gods
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Passive
battleTraits.lore: Few Darkoath tribes swear such grand and terrible oaths as those of the Snow Peaks. Fewer still fulfil so many of their brutal pledges.
battleTraits.effect:
Each time a friendly SNOW PEAKS unit uses 1 of the following abilities and the effect of that ability is resolved, gain 1 oath point.

• ‘Oath of Bloodshed’
• ‘Oath of Murder’
• ‘Oath of Supremacy’
• ‘Oath of the Marauder’
• ‘Oath of the Raider’
• ‘Oath of Conquest’

Designer’s Note: The abilities listed above are abilities on DARKOATH warscrolls. By using those abilities (i.e. completing the oaths), the player gains oath points, which can then be spent to use the OATH abilities in these Army of Renown rules.

battleTraits.name: Descent From Ruinous Skies
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Your Movement Phase
battleTraits.lore: Riding down from fell portals torn open in the sky, the Swords of Chaos descend to unleash apocalyptic destruction upon the enemies of the Everchosen.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly SWORDS OF CHAOS unit that is in the Ruinous Skies.
battleTraits.effect: Set up that unit anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

battleTraits.name: Knights of the First Circle
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Deployment Phase
battleTraits.lore: The First Circle of the Varanguard comprises Archaon’s own elite retinue. When they strike from the Chaos-cursed skies, ruin surely follows.
battleTraits.declare: If there are more friendly SWORDS OF CHAOS units on the battlefield than there are set up in reserve, pick a friendly SWORDS OF CHAOS unit that has not been deployed.
battleTraits.effect: Set up that unit in reserve in the Ruinous Skies. It has now been deployed.

battleTraits.name: Demands of the Dark Gods
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Start of Battle Round
battleTraits.lore: Each of the Dark Gods covets Archaon’s service and that of the Swords of Chaos also. The Varanguard may exploit this to wrest boons from them – so long as their loyalty to the Everchosen remains paramount.
battleTraits.effect:
Pick 1 of the following effects:

Demand of Khorne: For the rest of the battle round, add 1 to the Rend characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly SWORDS OF CHAOS units.

Demand of Tzeentch: Pick 1 visible enemy unit within 9" of a friendly SWORDS OF CHAOS unit that is not in combat and roll a D6. On a 3+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that enemy unit equal to the roll.

Demand of Nurgle: Heal (D3) each friendly SWORDS OF CHAOS unit. Then pick a friendly SWORDS OF CHAOS unit that healed any damage points this turn. Until the start of the next battle round, that unit has WARD (6+).

Demand of Slaanesh: Add 2" to the Move characteristic of friendly SWORDS OF CHAOS units until the start of the next battle round.

battleTraits.name: Pledged to Nurgle
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Passive
battleTraits.lore: The Father of Plagues bestows gifts of rot and decay upon his followers.
battleTraits.effect: Friendly PLEDGED TO NURGLE units have WARD (6+). If a unit already has WARD (6+), it has WARD (5+) instead.

battleTraits.name: Pledged to Tzeentch
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
battleTraits.lore: Reality twists and weaves around these warriors as they become intertwined in the machinations of the Change God.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly PLEDGED TO TZEENTCH unit to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: Roll 2D6. Then pick a point within a number of inches of the target equal to the roll. Remove the target from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield wholly within 6" of that point and more than 9" from all enemy units.

battleTraits.name: Pledged to Slaanesh
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Your Charge Phase
battleTraits.lore: The thrill of battle drives these warriors to charge at spectacular speed.
battleTraits.effect: For the rest of the turn, when making charge rolls for friendly PLEDGED TO SLAANESH units, you can roll 1 additional dice (to a maximum of 3), but if you do, you must discard 1 dice of your choice.

battleTraits.name: Pledged to Khorne
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Passive
battleTraits.lore: The Blood God instils a blind rage in his most frenzied adherents.
battleTraits.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly PLEDGED TO KHORNE units.

battleTraits.name: Pledge to Chaos
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
battleTraits.lore: The Slaves to Darkness forsake their souls by pledging to the Dark Gods.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly non-UNIQUE SLAVES TO DARKNESS unit that does not already have one of the keywords below to be the target.
battleTraits.effect:
Pick 1 of the following Pledge to Chaos keywords:

• PLEDGED TO KHORNE
• PLEDGED TO TZEENTCH
• PLEDGED TO NURGLE
• PLEDGED TO SLAANESH

The target has that keyword for the rest of the battle.

battleTraits.name: Eye of the Gods
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Deployment Phase
battleTraits.lore: The mortal champions of Chaos seek to attract the notice of the gods by performing great deeds in battle.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly non-UNIQUE WARRIORS OF CHAOS or DARKOATH HERO to be the target.
battleTraits.effect:
During the battle, the target gains Dark Apotheosis points as follows:

• Each time the target uses a FIGHT ability, it gains D3 Dark Apotheosis points.
• At the end of each of your turns, if the target is contesting an objective that is wholly outside friendly territory, it gains D3 Dark Apotheosis points.

battleTraits.name: Dark Apotheosis
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Any Hero Phase
battleTraits.lore: Favoured by the Dark Gods, this champion is bestowed with fell glory.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly unit with 8 or more Dark Apotheosis points to be the target.
battleTraits.effect:
Pick 1 of the following:

Aura of Chaos: Heal (X) the target, where X is the number of damage points allocated to the target. In addition, the target has WARD (5+) for the rest of the battle.

Daemonhood: Set up a Daemon Prince within 1" of the target. Then, remove the target from the battlefield. If the target is your general, the Daemon Prince becomes your general instead and is added to your general’s regiment. If the target has any enhancements, the Daemon Prince has those enhancements instead. If the target has a Pledge to Chaos keyword, the Daemon Prince has the same keyword. Otherwise, pick 1 Pledge to Chaos keyword for the Daemon Prince to have for the rest of the battle. If any MANIFESTATIONS that were summoned by the target are on the battlefield, those MANIFESTATIONS are removed from play.
